data.name: vision
data.value: That the university maintain its pioneering role in the field of university education for the community within the Sultanate, and that the classical sciences be distinguished by its scouting research, its graduates, and its strategic partnerships.

data.name: mission
data.value: Excellence in teaching and learning, well-defined, community-aware, through the principles of scientific integration and creative thinking in a stimulating academic environment, participation in the production and dissemination of knowledge, and interaction with local communities.
